name: Levetiracetam prescribed as Keppra
title: Prescribing of branded Keppra tablets compared with prescribing of all levetiracetam tablets.
description: Total quantity of Keppra tablets as a proportion of total quantity of levetiracetam tablets.
why_it_matters: Keppra is an expensive branded form of the chemical levetiracetam. <a href='https://www.gov.uk/drug-safety-update/antiepileptic-drugs-new-advice-on-switching-between-different-manufacturers-products-for-a-particular-drug'>
The MHRA's guidance is that it is usually unnecessary
to maintain patients on a specific manufacturer's levetiracetam product unless there are specific concerns such as patient
anxiety, or risk of confusion or dosing errors.
numerator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0BBAAAA%' OR --Keppra_Tab 250mg 
bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0BBABAB%' OR --Keppra_Tab 500mg 
bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0BBACAC%' OR --Keppra_Tab 1g 
bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0BBAEAI%' --Keppra_Tab 750mg
denominator_where:
bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0AAAAAA%' OR --Levetiracetam_Tab 250mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0AAABAB%' OR --Levetiracetam_Tab 500mg (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0AAACAC%' OR --Levetiracetam_Tab 1g (brands and generic) 
bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0AAAIAI%' --Levetiracetam_Tab 750mg (brands and generic) 
OR bnf_code LIKE '0408010A0%AI'
